pull.title: refactor: Enable -Wswitch for FeeEstimateHorizon
pull.body: This enables the `-Wswitch` compiler warning for `FeeEstimateHorizon` by removing the `default` case in `switch` statements.

events.body: Concept ACK. I was making a similar refactoring here when adding the `estimatefeerate` rpc.

events.body: ACK faccf8b1e1af293dfe9158d732718e7798a2fd89, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK, I agree it can be merged.

> I was making a similar refactoring here when adding the `estimatefeerate` rpc.

Me too: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/166 :)

comments.body: nit, `assert(stats)` seems to be checking for more than missing cases (like `assert(false)`), maybe update the comment
I think the comment and `assert(stats);` are independent here, as `std::unique_ptr::get` could return `nullptr`.
